title: Coal Production for France
notes:
Data For 1870-1871 Were Affected By The Franco-Prussian War; Data For 1871 Also Affected By The Cession Of Alsace-Lorraine To Germany. Data Exclude Lignite Production, But Include Anthracite. Source: Direction Des Mines, Statistique De L'Industrie Minerale, 1870-1872 And Later Issues.

This NBER data series a01214 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01214
